success.cancelled: Your subscription has been cancelled. You will have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.
success.upgraded: Your subscription has been upgraded to the {{plan}} plan!
success.downgraded: Your subscription has been downgraded to the {{plan}} plan!

error.alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to this plan.
error.subscriptionFailed: Failed to complete subscription. Please try again later.
